description: A toy hammer made of plastic and cloth. Wrapped in barbed wire for brutality.
A toy hammer made of plastic and cloth. Embedded in it are a pair of circular sawblades, increasing the weight for blunt attacks, and allowing for brutal, deep cuts.

A rounded wooden implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. This one has had nails hammered into it, removing the utility in rolling dough. Maybe don't use this one on your beloved family, too. Unless you want to kill them.

A rounded wooden implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. Someone wrapped this one in barbed wire and razor blades, making it a deadlier cutting weapon.

A rounded wooden implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. This one was hollowed out, and what was a wooden core has been replaced with heavy lead to make it a more brutal weapon without sacrificing its use in the kitchen.

A rounded metal implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. Someone drilled spikes through this one, making it deadlier, but removing its utility.

A rounded metal implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. Someone wrapped barbed wire and razor blades around this one, making it a brutal cutting weapon.

A rounded metal implement, made for rolling dough, or issuing corporal punishment to unruly children and husbands. This one, while aluminum on the outside, has been refitted with a leaden core to create a lethal bludgeoning weapon/
